title: FEEDING: Closed-Loop Controls Boost Feeder Accuracy
text:
FEEDING: Closed-Loop Controls Boost Feeder Accuracy 
By Staff Report from Plastics Technology 
From: Plastics Technology Units come in a wide range of feed rates. 
Click Image to Enlarge 
Loss-in-weight feeder from Lingood USA, Houston, utilize an enclosed scale and provides users with a closed-loop control technology, which increases performance and reliability. The improved loss-in-weight feeder control accelerates the servo motor’s reaction time and improves feeder accuracy. It also supports the process interface for multi-range PLC/DCS. 
The feeders achieve ±0.5% accuracy and have feed rates ranging between 2-4,000 lb/hr, depending on feeder configuration and material characteristics. Feeders come with standard twin- or single-screw configurations, and interchangeable screw types are offered. 
Lingood feeders are available in the U.S. though Field Industries LLC . LEARN MORE
